attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to create awareness for motorists of horse and riders on the roads of britian.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rider's and motorists have a right to use britain's roads - a right to safe and enjoyable travel. Both share a responsibility to under stand each others needs. There are 3,000,000 rider in Britain, there are over 26,000,000 licensed vehicles on the road, there are over 8 horse related traffic accidents every day. on average 5 riders are killed each year, over half of all road accidents involving horses happen on minor roads. 
We wish for all road users to be aware of horse and riders to create a safer enviroment for us all.
